introduction: The following passage is adapted from The Gene: An Intimate History by Siddhartha Mukherjee (2016).
text: Mukherjee examines the history of genetic research, from early studies of heredity to the modern understanding of DNA. These discoveries ______ scientists to decode the genetic makeup of living organisms, enabling advancements in genetic engineering, personalized medicine, and biotechnology.
question: Which choice completes the text so that it conforms to the conventions of Standard English? Consider verb tense consistency, subject-verb agreement, and the alignment of the verb with the historical and scientific context of the passage.
explanation: Choice C is the best answer.
